page.title: 12Events in the area.
page.content: A{'Superstars Contest'}is held once a year.Different teams from the area take part.{Rugby Club Barbecue}held once a year to raise funds for the rugby club. For food we have a sausage and a beefburger eaten withrice,baked beans and bread rolls. Afterwards there is enternainment in the form of a comedy act, disco dancing and cabaret acts.{Llandyfaelog {Agricultural Show:}This show has been held once a year for the past 80 years or so. There are all sorts of competitions organised.{ Ferryside {School Fete:}Organised during the summmer term. Different types of stalls are organised such as, bran tub,cake stall,plant stall and raffle. {Guy Fawkes Night.}On Nov.5th we celebrate Guy Fawkes.{Llandyfaelog {Eisteddfod. Singing,recitation,etc.}
